lines.text: Add them to calculate net torque

secText:
Lesson:
1. Calculate and define [OBJ:expsec_i965:torque].
2. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_i967:torque] when the force is not applied perpendicularly.
3. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_i968:net torque].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37183:Calculate] torque.
2. [OBJ:qc_37192:Calculate] torque when the force is not applied perpendicularly.
3. [OBJ:qc_37187:Calculate] net torque.
